/** shared.findListVendor */ SELECT VD.VD_CD, VD.ERP_VD_CD, CASE WHEN VD.ERP_VD_CD IS NULL THEN VD.VD_CD ELSE VD.ERP_VD_CD END AS DISP_VD_CD, CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN VD.VD_NM_EN ELSE VD.VD_NM END AS DISP_VD_NM, VD.VD_NM, VD.VD_NM_EN, VD.BIZREGNO, VD.CTRY_CCD, VD.TAX_ID, VD.EU_VAT_REG_ID, VD.DTL_ADDR_1, VD.DTL_ADDR_2, OG.OORG_CD, OG.OBD_TYP_CCD, OG.OORG_INI_TRANSN_ST_DT, CH.CHR_NM, CH.EML, CH.DEPT_CD, CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN CH.DEPT_NM_EN ELSE CH.DEPT_NM END AS DEPT_NM, CH.TEL, CH.MOB FROM VD VD INNER JOIN OORG_VD OG ON OG.TEN_ID = VD.TEN_ID AND OG.VD_CD = VD.VD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT USR.TEN_ID, USR.VD_CD, USR.USR_NM AS CHR_NM, USR.EML, USR.TEL, USR.MOB, DEPT.DEPT_CD, DEPT.DEPT_NM_EN, DEPT.DEPT_NM FROM USR USR INNER JOIN ROLE ROLE ON ROLE.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID INNER JOIN ROLE_USR ROLE_USR ON ROLE.TEN_ID = ROLE_USR.TEN_ID AND ROLE.ROLE_CD = ROLE_USR.ROLE_CD AND ROLE_USR.USR_ID = USR.USR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DEPT.DEPT_CD = USR.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.STS != 'D'
AND ROLE_USR.ROLE_CD = #{p.role_cd} /* 직무 유형을 대체하는 롤코드 */
GROUP BY USR.TEN_ID, USR.VD_CD, USR.USR_NM, USR.EML, USR.TEL, USR.MOB, DEPT.DEPT_CD, DEPT.DEPT_NM_EN, DEPT.DEPT_NM ) CH /* 협력사 담당자*/ ON CH.TEN_ID = OG.TEN_ID AND CH.VD_CD = OG.VD_CD WHERE VD.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND OG.OORG_CD = #{p.oorg_cd} AND VD.STS != 'D'
AND VD.CTRY_CCD = #{p.ctry_ccd} /* 국가 코드 */
AND OG.OBD_TYP_CCD = #{p.obd_typ_ccd} /* 등록유형 거래유형*/
AND VD.ERP_VD_CD LIKE UPPER(#{p_erp_vd_cd})
AND (UPPER(VD.VD_NM) LIKE UPPER(#{p_vd_nm}) OR UPPER(VD.VD_NM_EN) LIKE UPPER(#{p_vd_nm})) /* 협력사명 검색조건*/
ORDER BY VD.VD_CD DESC, CH.CHR_NM ASC

/* shared.findUserIdByBusinessRegistrationNumber: sp 사용자 정보 조회 */ SELECT A.CO_CD ,A.USR_ID ,A.USR_NM ,A.USR_NM_EN ,A.POSI_CCD ,A.DEPT_CD ,VDGL.BIZREGNO ,VDGL.VD_CD ,VDGL.VD_NM FROM USR A INNER JOIN VD VDGL ON VDGL.TEN_ID = A.TEN_ID AND VDGL.VD_CD = A.VD_CD WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{p.tenant} AND VDGL.BIZREGNO = #{p.bizregno} AND A.USR_TYP_CCD = 'VD' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'

/*shared.findListOperationOrganizationLinkVendor */ SELECT GL.VD_CD , GL.ERP_VD_CD , CASE WHEN 'ko_KR' = #{g.locale} THEN GL.VD_NM ELSE GL.VD_NM_EN END AS DISP_VD_NM , GL.VD_NM , GL.VD_NM_EN , GL.STS , GL.BIZREGNO , OG.OBD_TYP_CCD FROM VD GL INNER JOIN OORG_MAPG LM ON ( LM.TEN_ID = GL.TEN_ID AND LM.CONN_TYP_CCD = #{p.conn_typ_ccd} AND LM.CONNSRC_OORG_CD = #{p.connsrc_oorg_cd} ) INNER JOIN OORG_VD OG ON ( OG.TEN_ID = GL.TEN_ID AND OG.VD_CD = GL.VD_CD AND OG.OORG_CD = LM.CONNSUBJ_OORG_CD AND OG.OBD_TYP_CCD = 'OFC' /* 협력사 구분(E902): 거래업체 */ AND OG.TRANSN_POSS_YN = 'Y' /* 거래상태(E035): 거래 */ ) WHERE GL.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND GL.STS != 'D'
AND GL.ERP_VD_CD LIKE UPPER(#{p_erp_vd_cd})
AND (UPPER(GL.VD_NM_EN) LIKE UPPER(#{vendorNmPattern}) OR UPPER(GL.VD_NM) LIKE UPPER(#{vendorNmPattern}))
ORDER BY GL.VD_CD DESC

/* shared.findUserInfoByEmailAndUserId: portal 사용자 정보 조회 */ SELECT A.TEN_ID ,A.CO_CD ,A.USR_ID ,A.USR_NM ,A.USR_NM_EN ,A.POSI_CCD ,A.DEPT_CD ,A.TEL ,A.MOB ,A.FAX ,A.EML ,A.EML_RCPT_YN ,A.SMS_RCPT_YN ,A.USE_YN ,A.TMZ_CCD ,A.JOBTIT_CCD ,A.HOME_SCR_TYP_CCD FROM USR A WHERE TEN_ID = #{p.tenant} AND EML = #{p.eml} AND USR_ID = #{p.usr_id}
